The breadth of the bandÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s material reads like a recipe for American music gumbo; equal parts jump blues, rockabilly, swing and the spirit of New Orleans permeate their music along with a dose of vintage vibes added like Tabasco sauce.

Traveling and performing through the deep south, soaking up the sounds of roots music forms like bluegrass, delta blues, rockabilly and swing led April to seek out upright bassist JJ Culpepper to form the June Bugs. April Mae, lead vocalist, also plays washboard and percussion with the June Bugs.
